overview: This documentary is about the children's theater company "La Colmenita" from Cuba, which was founded in the darkest years of that country's special period. The documentary is supported by the testimonies of its founders, as well as artists of the stature of Silvio Rodr√≠guez, Omara Portuondo, Kcho. They are an example of how childhood can be saved with love.
title: Luces y duendes
